ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Abashi finally responds... sort of
ygData.msgSnippet: ... to ... the ... Actually, the shield had already been drawn for barbarians.  They just forgot to attach it to the character model, so the matter really
ygData.messageBody:
> I was originally thinking that the shield would be easier than the drum
to
> implement, since for the shield you'd only have to draw an item for
the
> right hand for male barbarians.

Actually, the shield had already been drawn for barbarians. They just
forgot to "attach" it to the character model, so the matter really was as
simple as everyone downloading a little bit of new information (okay, a
big bit). For us, they would have to model a drum from scratch. Not
that a small cylinder with pretty colors would be that difficult to
model...but oh, well.

-Karisma
www.heartsofvalor.com
